attributes.action: Better access for young people with mental health issues to NHS Crisis Support
attributes.additional_details: Parents have become frustrated that they cannot get the support they need for their children, who are suffering from depression and prone to suicidal thoughts and can become violent putting themselves and others at risk, GP's and other Health Professionals are also struggling to get the help and support they need, due to lack of funding and length of referral time to get their patients the best professional help they require, it is important that the now step in and give the NHS they now need.
attributes.background: Many children and adolescents across the country  with Neurological and Mental Health issues are facing long waits and limited support to NHS Crisis Support Services, which is is having a detrimental effect on their health and well being and has become worse during the Coronavirus Pandemic,

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Ensure mental health assessments for children are within 4 weeks of GP referral
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588224
